analyzed: khri rkang dang thod pa dang gsal zhing gis phug pa 'dzin pa /
translated: He holds a skull and a staff.

original: rgya mtsho chen po'i ske rags can /
analyzed: rgya mtsho chen po'i ske rags can /
translated: He wears a belt of great serpents.

original: stag gi pags pa'i na bza' 'tshang ba /
analyzed: stag gi pags pa'i na bza' 'tshang ba /
translated: He wears a tiger-skin skirt.

original: ro langs kyi tshogs 'joms par mdzad pa /
analyzed: ro langs kyi tshogs 'joms par mdzad pa /
translated: He destroys the host of vetƒÅlas.

original: bgegs chen po las skyob pa po //
analyzed: bgegs chen po las skyob pa po //
translated: He is the protector from great obstacles.

original: dgra la nges par gnod pa mdzad pa /
analyzed: dgra la nges par gnod pa mdzad pa /
translated: He is the one who definitely harms enemies.

original: stong gsum gyi stong chen po ba spu 'khyil pa gcig gi nang du gnas pa po //
analyzed: stong gsum gyi stong chen po ba spu 'khyil pa gcig gi nang du gnas pa po //
translated: He is the one who resides in a single curl of hair in the great trichiliocosm.

original: zhal brgya phrag stong mnga' ba /
analyzed: zhal brgya phrag stong mnga' ba /
translated: He has a thousand mouths.

original: ye shes kyi rgya mtsho'i zhal can /
analyzed: ye shes kyi rgya mtsho'i zhal can /
translated: He has a face of the ocean of wisdom.

original: sha chen po dang khrag dang zhag gsol ba po //
analyzed: sha chen po dang khrag dang zhag gsol ba po //
translated: He eats great flesh, blood, and marrow.

original: bdud thams cad kyi stobs 'joms pa po //
analyzed: bdud thams cad kyi stobs 'joms pa po //
translated: He is the one who conquers the power of all mƒÅras.

original: 'byin pa dang sdud pa mdzad pa po //
analyzed: 'byin pa dang sdud pa mdzad pa po //
translated: He is the one who emanates and gathers.

original: klu thams cad skems pa dang / rengs pa dang / rnam par 'ju bar mdzad pa /
analyzed: klu thams cad skems pa dang / rengs pa dang / rnam par 'ju bar mdzad pa /
translated: paralyzes them, and digests them.

original: rgyu ma'i phrer  ba 'dzin pa /
analyzed: rgyu ma'i phrer  ba 'dzin pa /
translated: He holds a garland of intestines.

original: ri rab g-yo gar byed pa'i sgra can /
analyzed: ri rab g-yo gar byed pa'i sgra can /
translated: He makes Mount Meru tremble and dance.

original: khro bo'i sku 'dzin pa /
analyzed: khro bo'i sku 'dzin pa /
translated: He holds the form of wrath.

original: go skabs chen po'i thig le'i bdag nyid can /
analyzed: go skabs chen po'i thig le'i bdag nyid can /
translated: He is the nature of the bindu of great opportunity.

original: sangs rgyas bye ba stong skad cig gis rdzogs par mdzad pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bye ba stong skad cig gis rdzogs par mdzad pa /
translated: He causes a hundred thousand buddhas to be instantly accomplished.

original: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa /
analyzed: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs pa /
translated: He causes a rain of the nectar of pristine consciousness to fall.

original: las thams cad rab tu 'jug par mdzad pa //
analyzed: las thams cad rab tu 'jug par mdzad pa //
translated: He causes all activities to be engaged.

original: 'ching bar byed pa /
analyzed: 'ching bar byed pa /
translated: He binds.

original: rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa /
translated: He conquers all concepts.

original: mgo bos 'khrigs pas reg pa'i sku can /üîΩgzhan gyis byas pa'i 'khrul 'khor @36a * //
analyzed: mgo bos 'khrigs pas reg pa'i sku can / gzhan gyis byas pa'i 'khrul 'khor @36a * //
translated: His body is touched by the crown of the head.

original: dang sngags 'joms pa po //
analyzed: dang sngags 'joms pa po //
translated: He conquers the machines and mantras created by others.

original: srung ba chen po byed pa /
analyzed: srung ba chen po byed pa /
translated: He performs great protection.

original: sdang ba rnams kyi rnam par 'joms pa po //
analyzed: sdang ba rnams kyi rnam par 'joms pa po //
translated: He conquers the angry ones.

original: chos 'byung bar mdzad pa /
analyzed: chos 'byung bar mdzad pa /
translated: He causes the Dharma to arise.

original: khro bo spro zhing spro bar byed du 'jug pa /
analyzed: khro bo spro zhing spro bar byed du 'jug pa /
translated: He emanates and causes wrath to emanate.

original: dbang po'i dra ba sems can thams cad kyi bdag nyid can /
analyzed: dbang po'i dra ba sems can thams cad kyi bdag nyid can /
translated: The net of the senses is the nature of all sentient beings.

original: 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / rab tu rtsod pa'i blo gros chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / rab tu rtsod pa'i blo gros chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the great mind of conflict, dispute, and contention.

original: rkang pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'i bstod pa'o //
analyzed: rkang pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'i bstod pa'o //
translated: This is the praise in forty-eight verses.

original: shr'i dza ya se n'a dang / dpal dar ma yon tan gyis bsgyur ro //
analyzed: shr'i dza ya se n'a dang / dpal dar ma yon tan gyis bsgyur ro //
translated: Translated by ≈örƒ´ Jayasena and ≈örƒ´ Dharmadhvaja.

original: 'di la tshigs su bcad par bsgyur pa'ang snang ngo //
analyzed: 'di la tshigs su bcad par bsgyur pa'ang snang ngo //
translated: Here, it also appears translated in verse.

original: dge ba 'di yis nye bar mtshon nas ni //üîΩsems can rnams kyis dus gsum bsags pa yi //
analyzed: dge ba 'di yis nye bar mtshon nas ni // sems can rnams kyis dus gsum bsags pa yi //
translated: By this virtue, as illustrated here,

original: zag bcas zag med zung 'jug dge ba rnams //
analyzed: zag bcas zag med zung 'jug dge ba rnams //
translated: The contaminated, uncontaminated, and unified virtues accumulated by sentient beings in the three times

original: bla med byang chub chen por bsngo bar bgyi //
analyzed: bla med byang chub chen por bsngo bar bgyi //
translated: I dedicate to the unsurpassed great enlightenment.

original: 'gro kun thams cad mkhyen pa thob par shog /
analyzed: 'gro kun thams cad mkhyen pa thob par shog /
translated: May all beings attain omniscience.
